current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Administrator of the Environmental
		  Protection Agency to include in any proposed rule that limits greenhouse gas
		  emissions and imposes increased costs on other Federal agencies an offset from
		  funds available to the Administrator for all projected increased costs that the
		  proposed rule would impose on other Federal agencies.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Environment and Public Works
